title: Jak Architecture
description: New website for Jak Architecture, created in collaboration with designer Chloe Larkin. Jak is a local architecture firm whose work strengthens the connection between people, place, and context. The site extends JAK’s timeless and culturally responsive ethos, and is built with purpose to endure.

title: Albus Lumen
description: Custom Shopify Theme updates for Albus Lumen. New Navigation, Category Structure and Blog implementation to improve user experience and site performance.

title: Christopher Myles Henderson
description: Porrtfolio website for Chris Henderson – multidiciplinary artist. The site provides a minimal canvas allowing the diversity and eccentricity of his work to take centre stage.
